about_the_game:
Welcome to FAT LADS!

The ultimate party game that guarantees non-stop belly laughs and jiggly fun with the PLUMPEST LADS around! Immerse yourself in a gut-busting gaming experience filled with a variety of game modes designed to keep you and your CHUNKIEST LADS entertained for hours. Whether you're rolling those chubby bellies through absurd challenges or engaging in gut-busting mini-games, FAT LADS ensures a hefty dose of hilarity for everyone. What makes this game truly PHAT is the extensive customization options for your plump character – from outrageously oversized outfits to hilariously wobbly accessories, make your FAT LAD stand out in the most comically corpulent ways imaginable. Get ready to embrace the flab, revel in the absurdity, and create unforgettable memories with these CHUBBY CHUMS – where every moment is a fat celebration of friendship and laughter!



Current GameModes

  • Parkour Plumper: Navigate a hilarious obstacle course, testing your agility and bouncing belly prowess.

  • Chubby Plummet: Take a daring dive from great heights, embracing the chaos of free-fall with your rotund character.

  • Burger Hunt: Embark on a quest to collect the most mouthwatering burgers in this tasty scavenger hunt.

  • Flappy Flab Frenzy: Soar through the air, flapping your way past obstacles in a feathered fashion, but with extra flab!

  • Bulging Bomber Royale: Engage in an explosive battle of wits and strategy in a fat-themed Bomberman-style showdown.

  • Lard or Life: Face critical decisions in a survival challenge where every choice impacts your chubby character's fate.

  • Chubby Chase Circuit: Race against fellow fat enthusiasts in a fast-paced, gut-centric driving extravaganza.

  • Sideways Squeeze: Navigate tight spaces in a sideways-scrolling adventure, embracing the challenge of your plump physique.

  • Munching Marathon: Participate in a food-fueled endurance race, gobbling up goodies while outlasting the competition.

  • FPS Feast Frenzy: Arm yourself and engage in a wild first-person shooter free-for-all, where the fattest survives.

  • Tubby Treadmill Trek: Keep your character moving on a treadmill, overcoming obstacles and avoiding pitfalls in a race against time.

  • Infected Indulgence: Survive the contagious allure of indulgence as the infected try to spread their chubby charm.

  • Blubber Brawl: Step into the arena for a fat-filled battle royale, where the last jiggling champion claims victory.

More Coming Soon!

name: FAT LADS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8 GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 8 GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The ultimate party game for belly laughs! Dive into a gut-busting gaming experience featuring various hilarious modes to keep you and your CHUNKY LADS entertained! Every moment in FAT LADS is a phat celebration of friendship and laughter! Supports up to 100 players online!
